movie.title: Flesh and Bone
movie.description_intro: Around thirty years after Arlis witnessed his father murdering a family, he runs into Kay, who happens to be the family's baby, who was spared. Kay and Arlis suspect nothing about each other, but when his father returns, old wounds are reopened.
movie.description_full: Around thirty years after Arlis witnessed his father murdering a family, he runs into Kay, who happens to be the family's baby, who was spared. Kay and Arlis suspect nothing about each other, but when his father returns, old wounds are reopened.

movies.title: Open Season 3
movies.summary: Boog's friends rally to bring him home from a Russian traveling circus.
movies.description_full: Boog's friends rally to bring him home from a Russian traveling circus.
movies.synopsis: Boog's friends rally to bring him home from a Russian traveling circus.

movies.title: The Lion King 3: Hakuna Matata
movies.summary: Timon and Pumbaa start to watch the original Lion King movie, but Timon keeps insisting to fast forward to when they come in, because they weren't seen in the beginning of the story or anywhere until halfway through. Pumbaa suggests telling the audience their story, which begins before Simba's journey begins. Through this, we meet Timon's mother and Uncle Max, discover why he left his meerkat colony, where he learned Hakuna Matata, how he meets Pumbaa, and the perils they encountered while searching for their dream home.

movies.title: Wild in Blue
movies.summary: While filming his sadistic relationship with women, a killer's infatuation with a potential victim forces him to confront his past.
movies.description_full: While filming his sadistic relationship with women, a killer's infatuation with a potential victim forces him to confront his past.

movies.title: Bachaana
movies.summary: A bubbly Indian girl, Aalia, while on vacation in Mauritius, is forced by circumstances to place her faith in a Pakistani cab driver, Vicky, who then takes it upon himself to make Aalia's safe return to India possible.
